mapper.sql: id menuId, name menuName, url menuUrl, is_parent isParent, parent_id parentId, sort menuOrder, icon menuIcon, create_time createTime
mapper.select: SELECT t3.id menuId,t3.name menuName,t3.url menuUrl,t3.parent_id parentId,t3.sort menuOrder,t3.icon menuIcon,t3.create_time createTime FROM sys_user t1 LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu t2 ON t1.role_id = t2.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_menu t3 ON t3.id = t2.menu_id WHERE t1.sid = 1 AND t3.parent_id = #{0} ORDER BY t3.sort
select menu_id from sys_role_menu where role_id = #{roleId}
